extendedInfo.description: Employee Navigatorâs Essentials app for Android is a first-of-its-kind tool that puts real-time insurance and HR information right where you need it most â in the palm of your hand.This app is like having a direct line to your insurance carrier without the aggravation of dealing with those automated phone response systems you hear when calling in for coverage information after realizing youâve misplaced your ID card and your benefit package given to you by your employer.All of your employee benefits information will be in one place, including ID card information, contact numbers, deductibles, co-payments, pharmacy locations and more. Simply ask your insurance broker to activate this easy to use app for your company and youâll never have to dig for your insurance card again.EMPLOYEE FEATURES:â¢ Easy-to-use interfaceâ¢ All of your employee benefits in a single place: medical, prescription, dental, vision, life insurance, short term disability, long term disability, voluntary benefits, and more!â¢ Instant access to your policy numbers, deductibles, co-payments, contact names, phone numbers, and plan descriptions.â¢ Search functions integrated with Maps make it easy to locate nearby pharmacies, medical labs and radiology centers, as well as medical supply stores.â¢ Online drug reference database powered by Drugs.com gives you instant access to Rx descriptions so you can read about the drug before filling the prescription.â¢ Company document library for storing and accessing important files like employee handbooks and human resources forms.HR FEATURES:â¢ Company document library for storing and accessing important files like employee handbooks and human resources forms.â¢ Documents and plans are stored and accessible only to eligible classes of employees.â¢ Unlimited employees and plans can be set-up.â¢ Important phone numbers and customizable descriptions are easy to addâ¢ Integrates with Employee Navigatorâs online benefits administration systemBroker Featuresâ¢ Access to HR and Employee data for unlimited companiesâ¢ Add and view Company Notes or Employee Notesâ¢ Branded mobile app for all of your clients

reviews.comment: My wife can finally stop asking me questions
reviews.author: A Google User
